title: New: Drake – Dreams Money Can Buy
content:
With Drake’s sophomore LP just around the corner, it’s nice to see his new material sounding as fresh as this.

  Dreams Money Can Buy was dropped on Drake’s blog a few days ago accompanied with this statement “Not my single. Just a piece of my story. Hear me out though…”; certainly interesting when pondering the style of the new album. The track itself samples Jai Paul’s underground anthem BTSTU, lifting the day-dream sounding lyrics and wrapping it in the honest and believable world that Drake creates so confidently. Check it out bellow.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
